entry.title: Ambivalent execution
entry.body: I think I keep postponing finishing because I'm scared it will expose that I'm not actually good at this.
entry.notes: Designed to trigger editor causal inference + format break

outputs.editor:
SUMMARY:
Driven by fear of failure, I postpone finishing because I want to protect my self-image.

- "postponing finishing": be specific about how it shows up.
